NavigatorShare.summary: The navigator.share() method of the Web Share API invokes the native sharing mechanism of the device to share data such as text, URLs, or files. The available share targets depend on the device, but might include the clipboard, contacts and email applications, websites, Bluetooth, etc.

remarks.para:
The method resolves a with undefined.
On Windows this happens when the share popup is launched, while on Android the promise resolves once the data has successfully been passed to the share target.

NavigatorShare.returns: A that resolves with undefined, or rejected with one of the Exceptions given below.
